message: I think I need to install the Mac dev tools, which I don't have for my version of the OS. I think I need to upgrade the OS, then I can download the tools from Apple (or maybe get them from the disk)
@swashbuck1r What is your issue with rails upgrade?
I wish I could get my rails upgraded on my mac...apparently I'm not smart enough
I stuck with the system ruby - so in the event I wanted to use dtrace I could
Yep, the dev tools are on the install disk (or the 2nd one). Once they're installed system update will pull down the latest xcode
